item.title: 内华达州锂交易后，通用汽车将目光投向其他电动汽车矿物供应来源
item.description: 通用汽车公司一位高管周四表示，继本周早些时候将对内华达州一座矿山的投资额提高到近 10 亿美元后，通用汽车正着眼于在北美进一步投资锂和其他用于制造电动汽车的关键矿产。【原文：General Motors is eyeing further North American investments in lithium and other critical minerals used to build electric vehicles after boosting its investment in a Nevada mine to nearly $1 billion earlier this week, an executive said on Thursday.】

item.title: 文件显示，美国联邦贸易委员会正在对迪尔进行反垄断和消费者保护调查
item.description: 据周四公开的一份文件显示，美国联邦贸易委员会正在对农用设备制造商迪尔公司进行反垄断和消费者保护调查，调查与该公司的维修政策有关。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission is probing farm equipment maker Deere in an antitrust and consumer protection inquiry related to the company's repair policies, according to a filing made public on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国机器人出租车公司 Pony AI 申请在美国上市
item.description: 中国自动驾驶公司小马智行（Pony AI）周四在美国提交了首次公开募股申请，这是投资者对新股上市兴趣日增、监管压力减轻的又一迹象。【原文：China-based autonomous driving firm Pony AI filed for an initial public offering in the U.S. on Thursday, in another sign of growing investor interest in new listings and easing regulatory pressures.】

item.title: 谷歌将双子座应用团队转至 DeepMind
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周四表示，将把 "双子座"（Gemini）应用程序背后的团队转移到其人工智能研究实验室 DeepMind，因为这家搜索巨头希望精简其结构，并在生成式人工智能竞赛中更好地定位自己。【原文：Alphabet's Google said on Thursday it will move the team behind the Gemini app to its artificial intelligence research lab DeepMind as the search giant looks to streamline its structure and better position itself in the generative AI race.】

item.title: 消费者团体要求美国联邦贸易委员会阻止诺和诺德控股公司与卡塔伦特公司的交易
item.description: 五个美国消费者团体和两个大型工会周四敦促美国联邦贸易委员会阻止诺和诺德公司的控股股东收购合同药品制造商康泰伦特公司，称该交易威胁到减肥药和尖端基因疗法领域的竞争。【原文：Five U.S. consumer groups and two large labor unions urged the U.S. Federal Trade Commission on Thursday to block Novo Nordisk's controlling shareholder from acquiring contract drug manufacturer Catalent , saying the deal threatens competition in weight loss drugs and cutting-edge gene therapies.】

item.title: 通用汽车支持墨西哥推动加强地区供应链
item.description: 美国汽车制造商通用汽车公司（General Motors）周四表示，该公司完全支持墨西哥政府加强该地区供应链的举措，但拒绝 "回应有关未来计划的猜测"。【原文：U.S. automaker General Motors said on Thursday that it fully supported the Mexican government's push to strengthen supply chains in the region, though it declined to "respond to speculation about future plans."】

item.title: 亿万富翁对冲基金经理勒布转移投资组合，关注共和党可能赢得美国大选
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者丹尼尔-勒布（Daniel Loeb）调整了他的投资组合，以捕捉11月5日美国大选后企业活动的潜在繁荣，他预计共和党将在大选中获胜。【原文：Billionaire investor Daniel Loeb adjusted his portfolio to capture a potential boom in corporate activity after the Nov. 5 U.S. election where he expects the Republican Party will chalk up wins.】

item.title: 美国拟对 ESPN 在 NBA 促销活动中不当使用紧急提示音处以 14.7 万美元罚款
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会周四表示，拟对沃尔特-迪斯尼公司旗下的 ESPN 电视网处以 14.7 万美元的罚款，原因是该电视网违反了在 2023-2024 NBA 赛季开始的宣传片段中播放紧急警报音的规定。【原文：The Federal Communications Commission said on Thursday it was proposing to fine Walt Disney's ESPN network $147,000 for violating rules on broadcasting emergency alert tones during promotional segments for the start of the 2023-2024 NBA season.】

item.title: Cucinelli 扭转行业黯淡趋势，实现收入增长
item.description: 意大利奢侈品集团布鲁内罗-库奇内利（Brunello Cucinelli）周四表示，在美洲和亚洲两位数增长的推动下，该集团今年前九个月的收入按固定汇率计算增长了 12.7%。【原文：Revenues at Brunello Cucinelli rose 12.7% at constant exchange rates in the first nine months of the year, driven by double digit growth in the Americas and in Asia, the Italian luxury group said on Thursday.】

item.title: 勒布的 Third Point 第三季度增持 DSV 股份，认为 "上升空间巨大
item.description: 亿万富翁对冲基金经理丹尼尔-勒布（Daniel Loeb）周四告诉投资者，他的公司Third Point在第三季度增持了DSV A/S的股份，他认为这家丹麦货运代理和物流公司有 "巨大的上升空间"。【原文：Billionaire hedge fund manager Daniel Loeb told investors on Thursday that his firm Third Point built a new stake in DSV A/S during the third quarter and he sees "significant upside" for the Danish freight forwarder and logistics company.】

item.title: 贝恩公司与 OpenAI 扩大合作，向客户销售人工智能工具
item.description: 贝恩公司（Bain & Co）周四表示，它将扩大与 OpenAI 的合作，向该咨询公司的客户销售这家人工智能初创公司的工具，包括 ChatGPT。【原文：Bain & Co said on Thursday it will expand its partnership with OpenAI to sell the AI startup's tools, including ChatGPT, to the consultancy's clients.】

item.title: 计费软件公司 Zuora 将与银湖、GIC 达成 17 亿美元的私有化交易
item.description: 计费软件公司 Zuora 周四表示，已同意被收购公司 Silver Lake 和新加坡财富基金 GIC 收购，交易价值为 17 亿美元，其股价在早盘交易中上涨了近 6%。【原文：Billing software firm Zuora said on Thursday it has agreed to be acquired by buyout firm Silver Lake and Singaporean wealth fund GIC in a deal valued at $1.7 billion, sending its shares up nearly 6% in early trading.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称英国石油公司考虑出售海上风电业务少数股权
item.description: 据四位知情人士透露，英国石油公司（BP）正在考虑出售其海上风电业务的少数股份，这是首席执行官穆雷-奥金克斯（Murray Auchincloss）为减少该能源公司对可再生能源的关注而做出的最新努力。【原文：BP is considering selling a minority stake in its offshore wind business, according to four sources with knowledge of the matter, the latest effort by CEO Murray Auchincloss to scale back the energy company's focus on renewables.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）称，美国银行倒闭基金提前收回
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation）官员周四表示，为近 10 万亿美元的受保银行存款提供支持的美国政府基金正在从近年来的下降和损失中提前恢复，而银行系统在很大程度上仍具有韧性。【原文：The U.S. government fund that backstops nearly $10 trillion in insured bank deposits is recovering ahead of schedule from declines and losses in recent years, while the banking system remains largely resilient, U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation officials said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国市场放缓，雷朋制造商依视路销售额不及预期
item.description: 受中国消费者支出放缓的影响，法意眼镜制造商依视路（EssilorLuxottica）周四公布的第三季度营收未达预期。【原文：Franco-Italian eyewear maker EssilorLuxottica missed third quarter revenue expectations on Thursday, dented by a slowdown in consumer spending in China.】

item.title: 亚马逊 Prime Video 选用前 NBC 主播威廉姆斯进行大选日特别报道
item.description: 美国全国广播公司（NBC）前主播布赖恩-威廉姆斯（Brian Williams）周四表示，亚马逊公司将于 11 月 5 日主持一个特别节目，向亚马逊用户提供选举结果和分析，亚马逊公司希望利用今年最令人期待的事件之一。【原文：Former NBC anchor Brian Williams will host a special one-night show delivering election results and analysis to Amazon.com customers on Nov. 5, the company said on Thursday as it looks to capitalize on one of the most anticipated events of the year.】

item.title: 美国 8 月商业库存因零售库存增加而上升
item.description: 美国政府周四公布的数据显示，受零售商库存的拉动，8月份美国商业库存有所增加。【原文：U.S. business inventories increased in August, lifted by stocks at retailers, government data showed on Thursday.】

item.title: Meta 与好莱坞 Blumhouse 合作，测试其人工智能电影生成模型
item.description: Facebook 的所有者 Meta 周四表示，它已与好莱坞公司 Blumhouse Productions 合作，对其新的生成式人工智能视频模型 Movie Gen 进行测试，Blumhouse Productions 是《The Purge》和《Get Out》等热门恐怖电影的幕后公司。【原文：Facebook owner Meta said on Thursday it had teamed up with Blumhouse Productions, the Hollywood company behind popular horror films such as "The Purge" and "Get Out," to put its new generative AI video model Movie Gen to the test.】

item.title: 切尼尔能源公司更接近于在得克萨斯州开始新的液化天然气出口业务
item.description: 周四，切尼尔能源公司（Cheniere Energy）获得了联邦监管机构的许可，将一条供应线投入运营，从而向德克萨斯州科珀斯克里斯蒂（Corpus Christi）扩建项目生产第一批液化天然气又迈进了一步。【原文：Cheniere Energy moved one step closer to producing first liquefied natural gas from a Corpus Christi, Texas, expansion project on Thursday after it received permission from federal regulators to put a supply line into operation.】

item.title: 波音罢工、飓风海伦影响美国工业生产
item.description: 受波音公司罢工和包括海伦在内的两次飓风影响，美国 9 月份工业生产下降。【原文：U.S. industrial production fell in September, weighed down by a strike at Boeing and two hurricanes, including Helene.】

item.title: 法国预算案的税收力度远超预期
item.description: 根据新的细分数据，法国勒紧裤腰带的预算案带来的税收打击比政府最初宣称的要大，这表明埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的亲商传统受到了更大的冲击。【原文：France's belt-tightening budget delivers a bigger tax hit than the government originally let on, according to new breakdowns that suggest a bigger dent in President Emmanuel Macron's pro-business legacy.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁预计中期增长乏力，敦促改革
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周四表示，国际货币基金组织的最新预测显示，全球经济的未来将面临困难，中期增长乏力、贸易紧张局势升级和债务高企将是其特点。【原文：New forecasts by the International Monetary Fund point to a difficult future for the global economy marked by lackluster medium-term growth, escalating trade tensions and high levels of debt, IMF Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said on Thursday.】

item.title: 纽约联储新工具表明资产负债表缩减有更大空间
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周四推出的一项新工具显示，美联储没有面临迫在眉睫的市场流动性挑战，无法阻止其资产负债表的持续收缩。【原文：The Federal Reserve faces no imminent market liquidity challenges that could stop the ongoing contraction of its balance sheet, according to a new tool launched Thursday by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商信心连续第二个月上升
item.description: 美国房屋建筑商的信心在 10 月份连续第二个月上升，但波动的抵押贷款利率和较低的住房负担能力继续构成阻力。【原文：U.S. home builder confidence rose in October for the second consecutive month but volatile mortgage rates and low housing affordability continued to pose headwinds.】

item.title: 大型央行坚定地进入降息模式
item.description: 路透社追踪的 10 大发达市场中央银行中，有 7 家现已开始放松政策，由于政策制定者强调数据依赖性，对各家央行将以多快的速度放宽政策的预期前后摇摆不定。【原文：Seven of the 10 big developed-market central banks tracked by Reuters have now started easing policy, with expectations of how quickly each will move swinging back and forth as policymakers stress data dependency.】

item.title: 雀巢标榜美国大选前后购物者的不确定性
item.description: 雀巢公司周四表示，消费者对美国大选的 "担忧 "给其最大市场的需求带来了进一步的压力，因为这造成了消费者的不确定性。【原文：Nestle on Thursday said shopper "concerns around the election" in the United States are putting further pressure on demand in its biggest market by creating consumer uncertainty.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Lucid 预计通过出售股票筹资 16.7 亿美元
item.description: 资金短缺的电动汽车制造商 Lucid 周四表示，公开发行超过 2.62 亿股股票可能会为公司带来 16.7 亿美元的收益。【原文：Cash-strapped electric vehicle maker Lucid said on Thursday a public offering of more than 262 million shares would likely fetch it $1.67 billion in proceeds.】

item.title: 即时观点：欧洲央行再次下调关键利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行周四今年第三次下调利率，指出欧元区的通胀率目前正日益受到控制，经济前景有所恶化。【原文：The European Central Bank cut interest rates for the third time this year on Thursday, pointing out that inflation in the euro zone is now increasingly under control and the economic outlook has worsened.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数意外下降
item.description: 上周，新申请失业救济的美国人数量意外下降，但在飓风海伦和米尔顿的影响下，短期内可能会继续上升，从而使劳动力市场的情况变得模糊不清。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment unexpectedly fell last week, but could remain elevated in the near-term amid the effects of Hurricanes Helene and Milton, obscuring the labor market picture.】

item.title: 美国 9 月零售额稳健增长
item.description: 美国 9 月份零售额增幅略高于预期，支持了第三季度经济保持强劲增长的观点。【原文：U.S. retail sales increased slightly more than expected in September, supporting views that the economy maintained a strong pace of growth in the third quarter.】
